short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a 1-click importer for Web pages and RSS feeds for Infinit.e community and enterprise users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides a 1-click importer for Web pages and RSS feeds for Infinit.e community and enterprise users. 

See the "Support" link for more details ("gears" icon to the right, under "Details" tab).
